title: Validation of Anderson Score for Diagnosis of Acute Appendicitis by Histopathology: A Prospective Observational Study
details: KS Goel, S Goel, N Goel, T Aggarwal - 2024
abstract: Background: Appendicectomy is a very common operation performed. Because of advances in ultrasonography and CT Scanning, there is improvement in the diagnosis of appendicitis, but still, clinical observation and experience of the surgeon …
